title: Tvvo bookes of ayres The first contayning diuine and morall songs: the second, light conceites of louers. To be sung to the lute and viols, in two, three, and foure parts: or by one voyce to an instrument. Composed by Thomas Campian.
author: Campion, Thomas, 1567-1620.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Tho. Snodham, for Mathew Lownes, and I. Browne Cum priuilegio,
